Treatment Options by Stage
		            
		                
		                    Stage I Uterine Sarcoma
		                    Treatment of stage I uterine sarcoma may include the following:         -  Surgery (total abdominal hysterectomy, bilateral salpingo-oophorectomy, and lymphadenectomy).    - Surgery followed by radiation therapy to the pelvis.     - Surgery followed by chemotherapy.
